taskbarTabs.description: An array of registered Taskbar Tabs.

id.description: UUID for the registered Taskbar Tab.

scopes.description: An array of scopes of valid domains for a Taskbar Tab.

contains.description: Scope of a valid domain for a Taskbar Tab.

hostname.description: The hostname of the scope. Note: matching second-level domains are considered in-scope navigation targets for existing Taskbar Tabs.

userContextId.description: The container associated to a Taskbar Tab.

startUrl.description: The starting URL opened when Taskbar Tab is launched from the taskbar.

name.description: The visible name of this Taskbar Tab.

shortcutRelativePath.description: The path to the shortcut relative to the Start Menu/Programs folder.
